channel.title: Attack speed
channel.description: can anyone tell me how to edit the attack speed because for some reason mine slowed down for testscape[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 02:58:05 PM[/size][hr]anyone please?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 03:02:56 PM[/size][hr]never mind it was only the weapon i was hold didnt have high attack speed... can anyone tell me how to change that?

item.title: Attack speed
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

i think you go into the client.java and search for this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip

then change around the

wepdelay = i think thats it lol i dont use testscape i just have a source i use p16
